column4: hello everyone, i have ubuntu 9.04 with a HD 120 GB i want to make a partition where i can install Windows, how can i do this and how much GB would be good?
hello everyone, i have ubuntu 9.04 with a HD 120 GB i want to make a partition where i can install Windows, how can i do this and how much GB would be good?
